comment.body: 宣传然教，加入然教，解救现在的这群人

I'm facing opposition generally to the any access protocol that isn't clearnet. I don't have a solution for the tendency of alternative anonymous networks to have a larger population of nefarious individuals providing content....I think changing the general perception that VPN, TOR, Whonix, ZeroNet etc are exclusively aiding and abetting criminals of all stripes is key. I could go on about the perils of censorship but I'd be preaching atheism to agnostics.

I agree, I just wish there was an even distribution of deviants on these alternative services. There is a point where polite society eschews the service altogether because of the concentration of miscreants. I agree with the point that media is supportive, we do need to go anonymous. They're reporting facts for a change.
